item.title: 08 Apr 2025 21:30
item.description: I walked out of REI super thrilled that I’d got a fantastic pair of hiking boots for 32 dollars , only to realize that we’d been given a parking violation ticket of 100 dollars. In a rush to finish shopping here and head over to meet the Burke’s, we totally misread these signs. You win some, you lose lots! ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: I walked out of REI super thrilled that I’d got a fantastic pair of hiking boots for 32 dollars , only to realize that we’d been given a parking violation ticket of 100 dollars. In a rush to finish shopping here and head over to meet the Burke’s, we totally misread these signs. You win some, you lose lots! ðŸ”—
